      public static final int MAX_STATIC_PORT
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • WorkersPool

      public WorkersPool(String multicastIP, int multicastPort)
      WorkersPool constructor.
      Creates MulticastManager for creation workers available in local network
      Parameters:
      multicastIP - address for multicast group
      multicastPort - port for multicast group

  • Method Details

    • launchWorker

      public int launchWorker(int startPort)
      Worker's creator.
      Trie to create and create worker on port up to MAX_STATIC_PORT, launches successfully created workers in virtual threads and adds them to lists of workers and threads
      Parameters:
      startPort - the first port for creation tries
      Returns:
      next port after acquired by this worker or -1 if worker wasn't created

    • launchWorkers

      public int launchWorkers(int startPort, int workersCount)
      Workers' launcher.
      Parameters:
      startPort - the first desired port for workers
      workersCount - desired count of workers
      Returns:
      count of successfully created and launched workers

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Soft workers pool shutdown.
      Shutdown is performed by setting on close flag in workers' instances

    • shutdownNow

      public void shutdownNow()
      Hard workers pool shutdown.
      Shutdown is performed by sending interruption to workers' threads
